title: RP not working
body: Yesterday i purchased a $25 prepaid RP card and I redeemed it. After there was no RP on my account but the card says its redeemed. Is this a glitch or what? Im still waiting for a response on my tickets and im very worried. i dont know what to do...

replies.body: It was most likely just a visual error that would correct itself on reloading. I can see where you last had RP added a little over a week ago though, hmmmm. Go ahead and hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look into this a little deeper for you since this seems a little fishy to me!
My friend had the same glitch but when he went to buy a skin all the RP reappeared.
